sailpoint.object
Interface Describable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Application, Bundle, CandidateRole, ManagedAttribute, Policy
public interface Describable

Interface for objects that have descriptions. As of the time this interface originated these are: Application, Policy, Bundle, ManagedAttribute
